title: New AAA PlayStation Game Announced! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.22.21
description:
Fran joins Tim to discuss a metric ton of PlayStation news, a new Battlefield game, new FPX Boost Xbox games, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:48 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Tom Bock, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:06:34 - New AAA PlayStation Multiplayer IP Announced (PlayStation Blog)
00:16:30 - Jim Ryan says PlayStation has been ‘quietly investing’ in PS5 exclusives (VideoGames Chronicle.com)
00:25:30 - Jim Ryan says Sony is devising a cloud strategy that will be ‘unique and only on PlayStation’ (VideoGamesChronicle.com)
00:29:55 - Sony confirms it’s ‘testing’ PlayStation Plus Video Pass in Poland (VideoGames Chronicle.com)
00:33:42 - PlayStation Now Upgrades to 1080p STreaming (Adam Bankhurst at IGN)
00:36:40 -  Ad
00:40:30 - Battlefield 2021 To Be Revealed Soon (Ash Parrish at Kotaku)
00:46:50 - Xbox FPS Boost Coming To EA Games (Major Nelson)
00:50:27 - Latest CD Projekt Red Sales Numbers (Daniel Ahmend ZhugeEX on Twitter)
00:55:00 - Out today
00:56:30 - Squad Up:Jonny Samsonite (PS5) - NugTats
00:56:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Fran
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
